timeline.bodyText: The filter isn't even needed. Looks like legacy of old code. Should be removed (if everyone's okay).
timeline.author: apeksharma

replies.bodyText: I guess it's just an extra check in case someone puts some unknown file in /valid? I'm okay either way keeping or removing.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: better to encapsulate each stream's file helpers separately in future
timeline.author: apeksharma

timeline.bodyText: removing if-else and pattern matching on files in favor of directly calling appropriate utility functions from fns overridden by downloader implementations.
timeline.author: apeksharma

timeline.bodyText: removed this for now since a lot of code here and in EventStreamFileParser (removed) seems sharable when done correctly
timeline.author: apeksharma

timeline.bodyText:
next 3 functions are dead code.
getAccountIDStringFromFilePath isn't needed due to changes in Downloader at top of this PR.
timeline.author: apeksharma

timeline.bodyText:
i undid them once, the IDE did it again. PITA :D
let's leave them for now until we do .editorconfig following which there can be one big auto formatting PR.
timeline.author: apeksharma

timeline.message:
Remove EventStream downloader and parser

- Removed unused functions in Utility.
- Leaving t_events table (so no db migration is needed)
- Removed is<type>File() functions.
  The ones for balances and event were not being used.
  Going forward, rather than calling Utility.function() from Downloader.java
  (or abstracted out parser code in future) which then does regex match and
  if-else on filename to call appropriate record/event/balance function, we'll
  use abstract functions in Downloader/Parser and implementations would directly
  call correct utility function.

Signed-off-by: Apekshit Sharma <apekshit.sharma@hedera.com>

Db migration to remove unused components
